name: Deck Joist Repair & Replacement
description: Repair or replace damaged deck joists to ensure structural integrity and safety for outdoor spaces.
rationale: Damaged joists can compromise the entire deck structure, making this a crucial repair for safety and longevity.

name: Rotten Trim Repair
description: Replace or repair rotten trim to restore the aesthetic and functional aspects of your home's exterior.
rationale: Addressing rotten trim prevents further decay and maintains the home's appearance and weather resistance.

name: Pressure-Treated Wood Installation
description: Install pressure-treated wood for decks, fences, and structures exposed to moisture, ensuring durability and resistance to decay.
rationale: Using pressure-treated wood is essential for outdoor structures to prevent rot and insect damage, especially in damp climates.

name: Deck Surface Refinishing
description: Refinish the surface of your deck to restore its appearance and protect it from the elements.
rationale: Regular refinishing extends the life of the deck and keeps it looking good, preventing future costly repairs.

name: Post Replacement and Repair
description: Replace or repair deck posts that have rotted or been damaged to maintain structural support.
rationale: Deck posts are critical for structural integrity; failing to address issues can lead to safety hazards.

name: Epoxy Wood Repair
description: Utilize high-strength epoxy to repair damaged wood components, ensuring a durable and long-lasting fix.
rationale: Epoxy repairs can extend the life of wood elements and maintain aesthetics while providing structural strength.

name: Deck Drainage Solutions
description: Implement drainage solutions to protect your deck from water damage and prolong its lifespan.
rationale: Proper drainage prevents water accumulation, which can lead to rot and structural issues over time.

name: Deck Lighting Installation
description: Install outdoor lighting on decks for enhanced safety and ambiance during the evenings.
rationale: Lighting improves safety and usability of decks at night, making outdoor spaces more functional and inviting.

name: Deck Staining and Sealing
description: Apply stain and sealant to protect your deck from UV rays and moisture, enhancing longevity.
rationale: Staining and sealing are vital for protecting wood from the elements, preventing premature decay and fading.

name: Deck Board Replacement
description: Replace damaged or warped deck boards to maintain a safe and attractive outdoor space.
rationale: Replacing damaged boards is crucial for safety and aesthetics, ensuring the deck remains usable and pleasing.
